org.sakaiproject.content.impl

Class SiteEmailNotificationContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.EmailNotification
      • org.sakaiproject.util.SiteEmailNotification
        • org.sakaiproject.content.impl.SiteEmailNotificationContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.event.api.NotificationAction

    public class SiteEmailNotificationContent
extends org.sakaiproject.util.SiteEmailNotification

    SiteEmailNotificationContent fills the notification message and headers with details from the content change that triggered the notification event.

    Author:
    Sakai Software Development Team
